Posts.EditableText:
I didn't know where else to post about this:

Whenever I attempt to remove a "GO TO" script on a room properties window, the program crashes.

What gives? Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,

Shoal
Posts.HTML:
I didn't know where else to post about this:

Whenever I attempt to remove a "GO TO" script on a room properties window, the program crashes.

What gives? Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,

Shoal

Posts.EditableText:
There is a known bug in QDK 3.12 where removing the last "go to" room causes an error. You can work around this by manually editing the ASL file in Notepad or TextPad and removing the relevant "place <......>" line.

This problem is fixed in QDK 3.5, but the current beta version introduces a few other bugs so you may be better off with v3.12 and manual editing for now.
